storyInfo: 22 years ago, a Columbian company has secretly sent a prototype sample to Sargon, thus drawing powers from all sides in. Kal'tsit protects the sole survivor, Elliot, and they set out on a journey together.

attributes.content: 22 Years Ago
3:09 P.M. \ Clear
Central Sargon, Ibut Region
Adviser.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: Confirm retrieval of target, and before any other teams form up and cut us off, pull out of here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Understood.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: This is the op team. Advanced-Ops Adviser has retrieved the 'Sand Soldier' survivor along with target material.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: Acknowledged.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: Adviser, recon team has ensured the safety of our route.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: Alright, then. Let's go.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Uh, Mr. Elliot, please kindly give that case to us.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: The boy tightly clutches the case in his hands.
Adviser?
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: Leave him be.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Pardon me, but we should confirm whether our objective materials are intact. And ensure 'no matter the circumstances,' they're safe under our grasp.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: You think he'll run?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No, of course... alright... understood.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Uh, why did we stop?
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary A

attributes.content: Seems we broke down.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary B

attributes.content: What's wrong? Caster, come take a look.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: Couldn't be out of fuel, right... did nobody inspect before we left base? Who was in charge?
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: J5 from the Stouthammer Squad was on vehicle inspection, but they're all on the recon team. What should we do? Get in touch with them?
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: Elliot.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Keep that case safe, and lower your head.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...What?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: What just exploded—woah!
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: Recon team?! Hey, can you hear us? Tell your Casters to stop! It's us, wait, it's us!
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Th—That thing in your hand—
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: (With vigor, it rouses itself.)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: No, don't be rash.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Protect this child.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Responds)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Hhhh—
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: What—What's happening?! Weren't they with you?! Here to help us?!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Stay alert, Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Agh—
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: (Dissatisfied)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Dammit! They split as cover to set up the whole goddamn circus...!!
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: Attention, Riverblade Squad, all members of Riverblade Squad!
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: The recon team has overtly attacked us, scratching every—clause of the contract! Caster division, ready up! Snipers, confirm bearings, and prepare to attack!
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: You all copy! The Stouthammer Squad has turned traitor! Fight back, open fire!!
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: In the barrens, escaping an armed motorcade on foot isn't much of a sagacious choice.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Stay here. This is the safest option.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Did you plan this, too?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: No. War can bring great profit to Columbia, but nobody wants that profit in anyone else's pocket. Dividing up interests isn't just about size, and satisfying everyone is extremely difficult.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As their advanced operations adviser, I've given sufficient counsel.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Including all 'betrayal' possibility.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Right now, there's a war going on outside...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: And you're just going to sit in here, unconcerned?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I have to remind you, Elliot, you also sit here, receiving my protection at that.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No... it's this box. They don't have the guts to attack us. I'm the one who's your protection, 'Adviser.'
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: (Discontentedly, it gazes afar.)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: I don't intend to retort. They absolutely won't dare destroy an Arts prototype that could convert half of Sargon's rainforests into barrens.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Despite its disguise as... an engine on an all-new power source.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What—What are you going on about...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Adviser! We can't hold out for much longer! We need to pull back immediately, and change course!
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: Please, bring the survivor with us! We'll ensure your safety!
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: How many withdrew?
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Less than twenty. Wretched losses.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: Let me say again, Captain, scores of our brothers just died.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: Thanks to them pulling a heel turn out of their assholes in the middle of an operation! The company's gonna send people to wipe every last one of 'em off the goddamn map!!
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: I... don't know about that. If the Stouthammers had this planned in advance, I'm worried the company hasn't got the reach into Sargon...
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Maybe they made a deal with some lord ameer. Or maybe, they just never...
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Ugh... the adviser and the kid?
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Right over there.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: Let me... let me talk with them alone.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Adviser.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Before we entered Sargon, I gave you the heads-up.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The military needed to light a fire in Sargon, and then wait for war to bring riches their way.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Factories, mines, the arms trade—every second of its existence, Columbia has been gnawing away at this ancient country, strengthening itself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So its military pulled a move, brought about the birth of the 'Sand Soldiers,' had them bring scientific researchers into Sargon... to carry out some 'tech support.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —But the Bureau doesn't take things that way at all.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: To be precise, it's the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Arts Units and Originium and its background desires that don't take things that way.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Perhaps Sargon is a backwards, rotting country to some people's eyes, but its ancient wealth and power still suffices to command servitude of all the dust in its sky, to become the desert under the Empire's gaze.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I have to say, the Bureau's viewpoint is correct.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: One portion of Columbia's people has grown narrow-minded with its ballooning riches and power. They mistakenly think they can cause wanton strife in Sargon without paying a price.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Any one Padishah's maneuvering is enough to influence those Columbian entrepreneurs' stock prices, yet they turn a blind eye to Sargon's vast might.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The policymakers are free to be ignorant, and failure in judgment won't harm their core interests, but you yourselves need to know just what it is you're doing.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: At least, you should know, this and your life or death are symbiotic.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Padishahs are the Sargon Empire's chief governors at the core, there to control their lords ameer. Would they... have anything to do with the company?
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: You know what it is the company wants, correct?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Certain high-ranking members of the military have seized some of Blaine Formative Technologies' principal shareholders, exporting these things to Sargon under unofficial cover in order to fulfill a deal with a lord ameer.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And what they truly desire is to employ these simple, crude methods to set off a power struggle within Ibut. Because that will turn profit.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But the Bureau believes that if the war spreads to the heart of the empire, every 'moneymaking' design will become fly ash.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So, the Bureau wants us to retrieve the target, so as to stop the military brass from going a step too far. That I get, but—
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: But the military's not stupid. Its spies within the company—perhaps you've already guessed who—have bribed the Stouthammer Squad to ensure the plans will remain in Sargon, and then a certain lord ameer can set off war.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: They had the balls?!
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Aside from the operation advisers that aren't me, all silently acknowledge this string of activity inside the company.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Chief of Business has no plans to stand on any side, allowing both parties to hold each other back. It might even bring in bonus grey income, after all.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: None of this is any kid's business.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Elliot Glover. Only 13 when he skipped a few grades and graduated, soon entering an academy for sciences and taking up studies in Originium technology.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Three years after, this young genius was picked out by Professor Thorne, to become in all respects his personal assistant.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Elliot is a member of the 'Sand Soldiers.' A research team crowned as soldiers who had no idea at all what awaited them in Sargon.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: They died tragically in the sandstorm without a single clue about anything, and none of us can deprive their last survivor of learning the complete picture.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Fine, I get it. No skin off my nose.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Now where were we? Oh, yeah, Bureau and the military pressured the company, and then in Sargon, all the lords ameer clashed...
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Heheh. We were betrayed from the very beginning. And we jumped into this war knowing scratch all...
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Where'd they get the balls to do this shit... Now they've thrown us into the desert like garbage, who can still guarantee things'll go how they want...?
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: The company never cared about what ultimately ended up in whose hands. Regardless of which of you survived to complete the mission, they'd still pocket a reward.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: To be precise, even if you all died right here, it wouldn't affect a single coin that falls into their pockets.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Because the ever-eyeing lords ameer and the Padishahs would've helped you settle and follow up on things otherwise, it's only natural they brought in the chaos.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The moment you were first drawn into Sargon by that enormous reward, you were already cornered.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Sorry, Adviser.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: You warned us out of the kindness of your heart, and you gave our op everything you had too. I respect you a hell of a lot more than I do those cigar munchers, all making up absolute shit at their meeting tables.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: But maybe... we still have one other option. Right now, pull out your arms, Adviser. I hope this decisive battle can preserve some dignity.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: You're going to kill her...!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Why not? That's what our original job really was, after all.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Don't lose your head, mercenary. I know you've received secret orders from the Chief of Business, but I also trust you understand that right now, following things to the letter will only cut off your own way out.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yeah, you've always given me an omniscient kind of impression...
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: The company sold us out, the Chief of Business sacked us like pawns, the lords ameer, the Padishahs and the Columbian military are all itching to kill us and snatch the goods—
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: —but we're mercs, and that's just morning coffee to us. As long as I can still make bank, I have no shits to give.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: What a pity.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm just the smallest fry in this whole whirlwind of crisis, but whether it's in the Bureau's interest or the military's—whatever. All that shit makes me dizzy—
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Even the company thinks you shouldn't hang around here any longer, Adviser.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: This is a good chance. A good chance to make a senior adviser in Sargon disappear. Some folks paid me a lot of money—heh, and I couldn't say if they were the same who bribed the Stouthammers.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: But none of that matters. I just wanna ask you one last thing... You... You've done so much. What was it all for, in the end?
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Columbia, Sargon, and perhaps Victoria as well. Uncountable powers all wrapped up in this. And though their lack of foresight led us here, all their innumerable machinations point towards one endgame.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —War.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: And war will bring ruin.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I simply try to stop this all from coming, despite how weak my influence is.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I... I don't know whether I oughta believe you... Maybe as long as I complete the Chief's orders and kill you, the company'll let us back in...
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Who would trust sixteen mercenaries forced to hole up in a cave, a scientist's boy assistant and a mercenary company's operations adviser? Who would willingly sit down with them to discuss where millions of lives are headed?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'll give you one final heads-up. Even if you make the Chief of Business happy, and make an obstructive adviser vanish in the middle of Sargon, it will not mean you can return home safe.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Every hired hand in these yellow dusts believes you've made off with the final legacy of the 'Sand Soldiers'... and they will make the choice to exterminate a flock of Columbians who offended their lord ameer's graces.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: After you kill me, you want to use Elliot as a bargaining chip, but would you have the leeway for a peaceful dialogue?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —No, you're right. I've got no chance of making any kind of 'deal' with the people who just killed my brothers. I don't work with the big picture like that.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Alright. You've convinced me, Adviser. I'll put down my crossbow, and you get that... uh, your pet out of sight a little.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: (A low roar, as if to menace.)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: How are you going to proceed?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If we keep working together, will you ensure we return to Columbia?
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Precisely the opposite. If you truly keep working with me, you will only add to the dangers you face.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But at the least, I can plot a route for you, and help you stow away into Minos. This is the safest path.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 'The safest path.' And you're not even gonna go with us?
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: My goal lies elsewhere.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There's no way you'd say you prepped this route just for us, right?
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Don't misunderstand. This is just for those who can get out of here alive, regardless of who they are.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Sounds a little like salvation, huh?
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: There's a hint of arrogance behind that word. If you have any misgivings, just treat this as a deal.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Alright, alright. Last time I didn't trust you we ended up right in the frying pan. Maybe this time I oughta be a little smarter...
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: This is a deal, Adviser. I want to use both your lives, to buy the lives of me and the brothers I have left.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Sixteen for two. Very cost-effective.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Damn right. Cost-effective. Hah. You saw this day coming from miles away, didn't you?
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Where are we... heading?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Where are we... I... I want to...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: There's a local place for dealings, which the local arms dealers and underground Originium goods merchants all call the 'Reefsteep Black Market'.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: When we find that market, its stowaways can help us out.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What's on your mind?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm thinking about... I...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I just... just left Teacher's body... in that makeshift...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I should've... I... the blood, and the screaming... nngh, ulp...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: *cough*, *cough* *cough* *cough*—
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Adviser's hit the road.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: What now?
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: Here's the map for the route the Adviser gave us. Not just the names of all the towns, but any Messenger stations we can use too. Can you guess how much this map'd be worth alone?
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Just where in holy hell did she come from?
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: Hell knows! But right now, she's the single straw we've got to grab at.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Tear up all identifying marks. Can't keep using these Columbian cars anymore. We'll head to the closest city on foot. Should be about thirty kilometers, then we'll rent a new ride and get out of here.
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: And we escape just like that?
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary

attributes.content: I know what you're thinking... but we still aren't ready for payback. We'll hide out for a bit. Then we can go back, deal with all those traitors companyside—
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: —Who's there?!
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: So you let the 'Sand Soldier' go... Now there's a twist.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: —Enemy raid! Snipers, rea—
attributes.name: Riverblade Squad Mercenary Captain

attributes.content: Leave three alive. Get the casters ready to grill them.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Deal with all the rest.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Have you calmed down some?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Counting researchers, the 'Sand Soldiers' were on the scale of a hundred people when they left Tkaronto.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You just experienced a massacre. This may be difficult, but you need to return to form as soon as possible.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Just what... do you intend to do?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Retrieve the Arts prototype plans in your embrace. Assuming no mishaps, there should also still be an Originium crystal sample in there.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ngh...!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: This will only delay the outbreak of war, but it will give us enough time. Enough to afford a few of my colleagues in Columbia the chance to try and change course.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You hardly even know what that case could unleash.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You can't! What kind of sick joke?! This is everything the Institute worked for!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Whether you trust me or not, I know full well just how important, how weighty, results paid for with countless lives are to a theoretical scientist.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But I also know, if this thing termed an 'Advanced Originium-Powered Arts Conversion Device' is given different application, the sheer harm it can bring about.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Many were aware of this. Naturally, this included your teacher.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Y-You don't mean to say Teacher knew we were doing wrong?!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: How dare you suggest—
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: So this is Sargon! Ah, a time-old charm of a country... look around here, at the heart of the wild-grown desert, no dependence on nomadic cities, still so full of life!
attributes.name: Professor Thorne

attributes.content: It is, Teacher.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Hm? Elliot, your mind's wandering. Come here, let me brush that gravel off your head.
attributes.name: Professor Thorne

attributes.content: Ah... th-thank you, Teacher.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Teacher, if you were this caring of the women who tried to woo you, I don't think your family would urge you so hard to get married.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Haha. Don't poke your teacher where it hurts, or else you'll be assigned to double next month's experiments.
attributes.name: Professor Thorne

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Teacher?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Ah, not much, just something that popped into my head. The mountain range at the end of the barrenlands, and the rainforest on the other side, must both be bursting with life too in their own ways, totally unlike the barrens we're in.
attributes.name: Professor Thorne

attributes.content: In that rainforest... could there reside people just as unlike those here? What kind of life do they lead, then? How does it fare?
attributes.name: Professor Thorne

attributes.content: The rainforest? Why all the sudden thought, Teacher?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Elliot. We believe our undertakings are for the benefit of ever more of humanity, for those still without the blessings of Originium technology.
attributes.name: Professor Thorne

attributes.content: But at times, the fruits of our research may not be implemented as we intended. Perhaps from the start, we choose a path wrong, excessively wrong, and when we realize it, we are powerless to redeem.
attributes.name: Professor Thorne

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Haha. Just supposing, provided a day like that dawned—
attributes.name: Professor Thorne

attributes.content: —We'd have to try and stop this all in its tracks.
attributes.name: Professor Thorne

attributes.content: Mr... Thorne, he...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I... No, it can't be, he was deceived... he...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Thorne's research had been rigged from the start.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The capital bounced around to land in his hands, disguised as an exciting investment in the new energy market, perfectly unscrupulous, giving nobody any doubts.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'd warned him before. But perhaps the experiments' success and advancement made him put his own misgivings aside.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No one is perfect, Elliot, but your labors will not become a catalyst of conflict and death. I came here to ensure that, and I need your assistance.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Right. You have five minutes to gather your thoughts, and then we'll leave.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: You want me to go with you?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: You'd only die in the barrens otherwise. I won't deny your gift for the mathematical and applied Originium fields, but you don't have even the first idea what vegetation can offer you any moisture content.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I don't want the last young one who knows the truth to senselessly pass away in front of me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Of course, if you feel your calling is at its end, that you have no need to press onward, I can arrange for your refuge in the Sargon countryside.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Just... Just who in the world are you? Why do you speak of everything so... downplayed?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I'm presently an Advanced Operations Adviser and Arts Instructor for the Westin Security Company, Columbia... If I have to repeat myself once more to you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I am Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Hm... look at this contract...
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: What a beautiful signature it is.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.text: She mediated between Columbia and Sargon. She toyed with the lords ameer and mercenaries in the palm of her hand.
She said she came to prevent war, to prevent Sargon's self-destruction—heh, what arresting ambitions.
They weren't her truest thoughts at all. Her preparations, profound, far-reaching, not to be known by anyone else, influenced the fates of many.
And we can scarcely see how long the path she walked was, or where it led.
